desc: Downtime. Delivered. Our curated book boxes & puzzle boxes are filled with organic teas & treats and opportunities to embrace your free time, switch off & enjoy life! Handpicked, hand-packaged, our subscription boxes are designed to give Canadians a little more downtime - love, from Vancouver Island, Canada @notbusyco The Not Busy Company

layout.text: Shop our most popular boxes now
from a single box to a full year subscription
